issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: Log refactoring: method invocation should be replaced by variable in hadoop tools

comments.body: Hi [~vrushalic], the patch has been here for a long time. I think we need to submit the patch to enable Jenkins pre-commit checks before a reviewer would review the code. Could you please submit the patch firstly? Thanks.
